attributes.additional_details:
Save our field!

There is a proposal to build 450 new homes on the field near Glebe Road/Piccadilly Road/Valley Road (backing onto Creighton Woods). This recreation ground is - and has been for years - an essential part of the community in Swinton (Rotherham, South Yorkshire). Families have grown up around the field, it provides a place to play and exercise and we need it in our community.

Sign the petition and help us to save our field!
